overview:
Jason has been co-founder of two web start-ups to date, and has been on the senior management team for others.

Jason created Diaperbags.com with a business partner in 2003. Over the course of a few years they fine tuned a successful ecommerce drop-ship model and shipped thousands of diaper bags to expectant mothers around the world.

His next venture took him into social media where he launched Outdoorzy.com with two like-minded outdoor enthusiasts in 2006. The site’s unique niche market and social features quickly made it a widely recognized name throughout the outdoor market.

A stint as VP of Marketing at Ecommerce Superstores was fruitful, as the team he worked with brought their main site, CoolComputerBags.com, 400% growth in traffic and sales.

Jason is still involved with Ecommerce Superstores and working as a web marketing consultant for clients throughout the US at his private consulting business, <a href="http://backcountry-communications">Backcountry Communications</a>.
